snippet: Former President Alfonso Portillo pleaded guilty Tuesday in Federal District Court in Manhattan to a charge that he accepted bribes in exchange for diplomatic recognition of Taiwan.
abstract: Former Guatemalan Pres Alfonso Portillo pleads guilty in Federal District Court in Manhattan to charge that he accepted bribes in exchange for diplomatic recognition of Taiwan.
lead_paragraph: Former President Alfonso Portillo pleaded guilty Tuesday in Federal District Court in Manhattan to a charge that he accepted bribes in exchange for diplomatic recognition of Taiwan.

headline.main: Guatemala: Ex-President Admits Taking Taiwan Bribes
headline.print_headline: Guatemala: Ex-President Admits Taking Taiwan Bribes
